get_netcdf_subset_ecmwf_ens module¶

Get NetCDF Subset ECMWF ENS

This script allows the user to get a subset of ECMWF ENS data. This tool downloads the data only in netCDF file format.

Usage:

get_netcdf_subset_ecmwf_ens.py –params = [single or multiple comma seperated parameter short names ] ..

–latbounds = [space seperated south and north float values] .. –lonbounds = [space seperated west and east float values] .. –out = [output filename] ..

dataex-client
